name: Abórbora
description:
🎃🖤 Birthday gift for my boyfriend! 🖤🎃

Avoid the pumpkins and collect three black hearts to unlock the ending. 🖤

👩🏻‍💻Code, 🎨 2D Art, UI and 🎵Soundtrack by Chris Simas

@lage_stella and helped me a lot with coding. She's the best!!  🖤Also plenty of youtube tutorials from Blackthornprod and Brackeys. 

A lot of great friends from Instagram helped me with animation, but special thanks to @victorbenicio.art for the private lessons on discord!
